Class LinearAlgebraRegistry

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.LinearAlgebraRegistry
public final class LinearAlgebraRegistry extends Object
Registry for Linear Algebra providers (Matrices and Tensors).

This class serves as the central point for discovering and selecting implementation providers.

* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
